meanings: [명사] driving, [동사] drive, take the wheel, be[sit] behind the wheel
(Am) drunk driving, (Am) DUI (Driving Under the Influence), (Am) DWI (Driving While Intoxicated), (Brit) drink-driving

examples.korean: The driver was slumped exhausted over the wheel. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 운전자는 탈진해서 운전대 위에 꼬꾸라져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: You’re not insured to drive our car. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 우리 차를 운전하는 것은 보험에 포함이 안 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The truck driver was waiting to unload. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 트럭 운전사는 짐을 내리기 위해 기다리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He pleaded guilty to driving with excess alcohol. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 음주 운전에 대해 유죄를 인정했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
